vsParam:
Ah wah wah... What, what to do?
This can't be restored, can it? Let me think, let me think...

Uh? What's going on, Escha?
Why are you so flustered...

Wow, so many delicious dessert!
... Hmm, leftovers?

Ah! Did I eat too much?
Haw-haw, I am just kidding...

Yes. Someone commissioned me to make those desserts,
I got hungry while making them...

So I wanted to taste them... But then I found
I don't have enough desserts.

And I've used up all the materials...
*Sob sob*, I am such an idiot...
So you are a glutton, huh? Escha.

*Boo-hoo*, don't be so straightforward!
I just thought they taste good, and then...

That's... alright, calm down now!
Take a deep breath, breathe in~ breathe out~

Any, anyway, I have to collect the materials to remake them!
Materials, materials... Oh my!?

Hehe, take your time and speak slowly. We'll wait.
Don't fall down...

*Sob*... Ah, right! Guys... May I ask if you guys could
help me collect materials?

Uh, got it!
Ah, but before that...

Anyway...
Wipe the cream on the corner of your mouth♪

Oh !?
Why, why don't you... say it earlier!

Phew... Thank you, guys!
We finally made it!

Er, that's wonderful!
Don't eat too much as samples next time, alright?
Sure, I'll only eat a little next time.

With everyone's help, I had some leftover materials,
so I made more desserts!
Taste them if you don't mind!

Wow, really!?
Actually, I wanted to try them♪

Me, too!
I am going to start... Uh... er!?
So, so good! This... is so yummy!?

Yes! No wonder Escha would eat too much.
Er! I can finish all of them!

Uh hee hee. I am glad that
you guys like my desserts so much!

Ah, let me see, the commissioned quantity...
It's okay, you can have some more!

Er... Guys?
I think we have eaten enough...

I am going too!
Just one piece...

Escha, Sorel... I understand you fondness
for the desserts, but you really can't eat any more!

Hmm, you niggard, Anis!
I just want one piece, there are so many...

No! We need to deliver first!
[px] and Cresson, come help me.
Oh, okay! We'll take all these!
